DOC.brief_summary: Postpartum haemorrhage lead cause maternal haemorrhage globally . With active management labour 3 16.5 % parturients still experience postpartum haemorrhage . Hence need effective oxytocic third stage labour .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Study Effects Sublingual Misoprostol Addition Standard AMTSL Low Risk Parturients LASUTH , Ikeja .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective randomize doubleblind control trial involve 660 consent pregnant woman . Eligible subject ransomised 2 group 330 participant . All patient receive standard oxytocin 10 unit part active management third stage labour . However , study group administer sublingual 400 misoprostol control group receive 2tablets placebo ( vitamin c ) . Measured mean blood loss comparee 2 group use statistical analysis .
